titles.title: To amend the Doug Barnard, Jr.--1996 Atlanta Centennial Olympic Games Commemorative Coin Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

action.text: Mr. Castle moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Senate Committee on Banking discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/14/1995--Introduced. Amends the Doug Barnard, Jr.-1996 Atlanta Centennial Olympic Games Commemorative Coin Act to modify its coin quantity specifications.
